lines.transliteration: a-lak-ti A.MEŠ ša {GIŠ}KIRI₆.MEŠ {ID₂}a-gam-mu u₂-šab-ši-ma ṣu-ṣu-u₂ qe₂-reb-ša as-ti-il IGIRA₂{MUŠEN}.MEŠ ŠAH.MEŠ {GIŠ}GI a-lap

lines.transliteration: qi₂-i-ši i-na lib₃-bi u₂-maš-šir i-na ṭe₃-em DINGIR-ma qe₂-reb {GIŠ}KIRI₆.MEŠ {GIŠ}GEŠTIN u gi-mir GURUN {GIŠ}se-er-du u₃ ŠIM.HI.A ma-gal
lines.gloss: forest in interior release at decision god interior orchard vine and totality fruit olive tree and aromatic substance very (much)

lines.transliteration: iš-mu-hu {GIŠ}ŠUR.MIN₃ {GIŠ}MES.MA₂.KAN.NA nap-har GIŠ.MEŠ i-ši-hu-ma u₂-ṣar-ri-šu₂ pa-pa-al-lum ap-pa-ra-a-ti ma-gal i-ši-ra MUŠEN AN-e
lines.gloss: grow cypress Dalbergia sissoo entirety tree grow (tall) spread out young shoot marsh very (much) be successful bird heaven

lines.transliteration: IGIRA₂{MUŠEN} qin-na iq-nun-ma ŠAH {GIŠ}GI a-lap qi₂-i-ši u₂-rap-pi-šu₂ ta-lit-tu {GIŠ}MES.MA₂.KAN.NA {GIŠ}ŠUR.MIN₃ tar-bit ṣip-pa-a-ti GI
lines.gloss: heron nest make a nest pig reed ox forest increase offspring Dalbergia sissoo cypress product of fruit orchard reed

lines.transliteration: AMBAR.MEŠ ša qe₂-reb {ID₂}a-gam-me ak-šiṭ-ma a-na šip-ri hi-ših-ti E₂.GAL.MEŠ be-lu-ti-ia lu e-pu-uš ul-tu šip-ri
lines.gloss: marsh that interior marsh(es) cut down for work requirement palace lordship may use after work

lines.transliteration: E₂.GAL-ia u₂-qat-tu-u₂ aš-šur EN GAL DINGIR.MEŠ u₃ {d}IŠ.TAR.MEŠ a-ši-bu-ut KUR aš-šur{KI} i-na qer-bi-ša₂ aq-re-ma
lines.gloss: palace finish 1 lord great god and goddess inhabitant land Assyria in interior invite

lines.transliteration: {UDU}SISKUR.MEŠ taš-ri-ih-te aq-qi₂-ma u₂-šat-lim kad₃-ra-a-a I₃.GIŠ {GIŠ}ser₂-di u₃ hi-bi-iš-ti u₂-raq-qa-a a-na ru-uš-te
lines.gloss: offering glorification make (an offering) grant generously present oil olive tree and crushed pieces (of aromatic wood) process oil into (a fine quality of oil)

lines.transliteration: i-na taš-ri-it E₂.GAL ša ba-hu-la-te KUR-ia u₂-ša₂-aš₂-qa-a muh-ha-ši-in GEŠTIN.MEŠ du-uš-šu-pu
lines.gloss: during inauguration palace of men land soak skull wine sweetened

lines.transliteration: ṣur-ra-ši-in am-kir i-na qi₂-bit aš-šur a-bu DINGIR.MEŠ u₃ {d}iš-tar šar-ra-ti {d}ALAD dum-qi₂
lines.gloss: interior water at command 1 father god and 1 queen protective deity goodness

lines.transliteration: {d}LAMMA dum-qi₂ qe₂-reb E₂.GAL ša₂-a-tu da-riš liš-tab-ru-u₂ a-a ip-par-ku-u₂ i-da-a-ša₂
